title: On Your Mark ジブリ実験剧场
original_title: On Your Mark ジブリ実験剧场
overview: Set in the future: The Earth's surface has been contaminated by radiation, the human population has taken refuge in large underground megalopolises. During a raid, two police officers discover a mysterious winged girl. Two men learn that the girl has been taken prisoner, and then decide that they must free her at any cost.
synopsis: Set in the future: The Earth's surface has been contaminated by radiation, the human population has taken refuge in large underground megalopolises.
